lst.name: sentence
lst.str: A flood watch covers much of the rest of Massachusetts, eastern interior Connecticut and coastal Rhode Island, along with the southern half of Vermont, the White mountains of New Hampshire and much of southern Maine.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The National Weather Service said a storm, centered off the east of Massachusetts early this morning, continued to produce rain across New England, and as far west as Michigan, Ohio and west Virginia.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: A flood warning remains in effect for small rivers in southern New Hampshire and extreme southwestern Maine.
